Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.service.impl.ProjectService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectService
public class ProjectService extends Object implements IProjectService
Implementation of the project service. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on the repository interface.
